articles.description: Santosh Munjal (92), wife of late Brijmohan Lall Munjal, Chairman Emeritus of Hero MotoCorp, breathed her last on Friday, a family statement said.
articles.content:
Santosh Munjal, matriarch of the Munjal family -- the promoters of the Hero group, has passed away, according to the family.
